explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for key and Bitmap data before attempting a cache edit; kept stream-closing responsibility in writeBitmapToFile as-is; guarded editor.abort() with a null check.
resolve_compilation_errors: Renamed the method to putBitmap(String, Bitmap) and added @Override to satisfy the ImageCache contract; replaced BuildConfig.DEBUG with LogA.isDebug(); relied on existing project types (DiskLruCache, Bitmap, LogA) without new imports.
exception_handling: Preserved the original IOException try/catch structure; ensured abort is attempted safely in both failure paths and secondary IOException during abort is ignored as before.
logic_customization: Kept the disk cache workflow unchanged (edit → write → flush → commit/abort) and only switched the debug condition to LogA.isDebug() without altering log intent or messages.
refactoring: Method rename for clarity and interface alignment; minor formatting cleanup after adding the annotation.
misc: Logging tags and messages were kept consistent; no new custom API calls beyond com.androidex.utils.LogA.isDebug().
